LanguageData.BlocksVacstone.label: vacstone blocks
LanguageData.BlocksVacstone.description: Blocks of compacted vacstone rock harvested from asteroids.
LanguageData.ChunkVacstone.label: vacstone chunk
LanguageData.ChunkVacstone.description: A chunk of rock. Can be cut into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.SmoothedSolidIce.label: smoothed solid ice
LanguageData.SmoothedSolidIce.description: Solid glacial ice. It can be mined through with relative ease. The polished surface glistens a soft light blue.
LanguageData.SmoothedVacstone.label: smoothed vacstone
LanguageData.SmoothedVacstone.description: Smoothed, compacted rock and dust harvested from asteroids.
LanguageData.SolidIce.label: solid ice
LanguageData.SolidIce.description: Solid glacial ice. It can be mined through with relative ease.
LanguageData.Vacstone.label: vacstone
LanguageData.Vacstone.description: Compacted rock and dust harvested from asteroids.
